column2: GW830 MERTHYR TYDFIL TO BARRY ISLAND VIA CARDIFF QUEEN STREET

column6: Platform detail must be shownTo/from Mountain Ash – GW834
For shunts to/from Pontypridd Station(North end)

Platform detail must be shown.  Valueswhich can be shown in the “PlatformDetails” field are:1 – Platform 1 (Bay Platform)2 – Platform 2 (Bi-directional)3 – Platform 3 (Up Platform, A train candepart to Radyr from this platform)
For shunts to/from Pontypridd Station(South end)
Platform detail must be shown.  Valueswhich can be shown in the “PlatformDetails” field are:1 – Platform 12 – Platform 2 (Bi-directional)3 – Platform 3
